00031 #ifndef _PMATH_H_

00034 #include <cmath>

00036 typedef unsigned int    uint32;
00037 typedef float                   Real;

00039 // common constants
00040 
00041 #define kEps    Real(0.0001f)
00042 #define kN1     Real(-1.0f)
00043 #define k0              Real(0.0f)
00044 #define kHalf   Real(0.5f)
00045 #define k1              Real(1.0f)
00046 #define k2              Real(2.0f)
00047 #define k3              Real(3.0f)
00048 #define k4              Real(4.0f)
00049 #define k5              Real(5.0f)
00050 #define k6              Real(6.0f)
00051 #define k7              Real(7.0f)
00052 #define k8              Real(8.0f)
00053 #define k9              Real(9.0f)
00054 #define k10     Real(10.0f)
00055 #define k11     Real(11.0f)
00056 #define k12     Real(12.0f)
00057 #define k1000   Real(1000.0f)

00072 namespace PMath {
00073         typedef Real Vec3f[3];          
00074         typedef Real Quaternion[4];             
00075         typedef Real Mat44[16];                 
00076 
00078         inline  Real Sqr(Real a)                                                                                                        { return a * a; }
00079 
00081         inline  Real Sqrt(Real a)                                                                                                       { return sqrtf(a); }
00082 
00084         inline  Real Abs(Real a)                                                                                                        { return (a > 0) ? a : -a; }
00085 
00087         inline  Real RecipSqrt(Real a)                                                                                          { return (k1 / std::sqrtf(a)); }
00088 
00090         inline  bool Equal(const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b, Real eps)                                      { return (Abs(a[0]-b[0]) + Abs(a[1]-b[1]) + Abs(a[2]-b[2])) < eps; } 
00091 
00093         inline  void Set(Vec3f& a, const Vec3f b)                                                                       { a[0] = b[0]; a[1] = b[1]; a[2] = b[2]; }
00094 
00096         inline  Real Dot(const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)                                                          { return a[0] * b[0] + a[1] * b[1] + a[2] * b[2]; }
00097 
00099         inline  void Zero(Vec3f& a)                                                                                                     { a[0] = Real(0.0f); a[1] = Real(0.0f); a[2] = Real(0.0f); }
00100 
00102         inline bool IsZero(const Vec3f a)                                                                                       { return Dot(a, a) <= kEps; }
00103 
00105         inline  Real Length(const Vec3f a)                                                                                      { return Sqrt(a[0]*a[0] + a[1]*a[1] + a[2]*a[2]); }
00106 
00108                         void Normalize(Vec3f& result, const Vec3f source);
00109 
00111         inline  void Add(Vec3f& a, const Vec3f b)                                                                       { a[0] += b[0]; a[1] += b[1]; a[2] += b[2]; }
00112 
00114         inline  void Add(Vec3f& result, const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)                           { result[0] = a[0]+b[0]; result[1] = a[1]+b[1]; result[2] = a[2]+b[2]; }
00115 
00117         inline  void Subtract(Vec3f& a, const Vec3f b)                                                          { a[0] -= b[0]; a[1] -= b[1]; a[2] -= b[2]; }
00118 
00120         inline  void Subtract(Vec3f& result, const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)                      { result[0] = a[0]-b[0]; result[1] = a[1]-b[1]; result[2] = a[2]-b[2]; }
00121 
00122         inline  Real Distance(const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)                                                     { Vec3f temp; Subtract(temp, a, b); return Length(temp); }
00123 
00125         inline  void MultiplyAccumulate(Vec3f& a, Real scale, const Vec3f b)            { a[0] += scale * b[0]; a[1] += scale * b[1]; a[2] += scale * b[2]; }
00126 
00128         inline  void Lerp(Vec3f& result, Real t, const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)          { result[0] = t * a[0] + (k1-t) * b[0]; result[1] = t * a[1] + (k1-t) * b[1]; result[2] = t * a[2] + (k1-t) * b[2]; }
00129 
00131         inline  void Multiply(Vec3f&a, const Vec3f b, const Vec3f c)                            { a[0] = b[0] * c[0]; a[1] = b[1] * c[1]; a[2] = b[2] * c[2]; }
00132 
00134         inline  void Cross(Vec3f& result, const Vec3f a, const Vec3f b)                         { result[0] = a[1]*b[2] - a[2]*b[1]; result[1] = a[2]*b[0] - a[0]*b[2]; result[2] = a[0]*b[1] - a[1]*b[0]; }
00135 
00137         inline void Negate(Vec3f& a)                                                                                            { a[0] *= kN1; a[1] *= kN1; a[2] *= kN1; }
00138 
00139         inline  void Scale(Vec3f& a, Real scale)                                                                        { a[0] *= scale; a[1] *= scale; a[2] *= scale; }
00140 
00142         inline  void SetScaled(Vec3f& a, Real scale, const Vec3f b)                                     { a[0] = scale * b[0]; a[1] = scale * b[1]; a[2] = scale * b[2]; }
00143 
00145                         void QuatToBasis(Mat44& pResult, const Quaternion a);
00146 
00148         inline  void Set(Quaternion& a, const Quaternion b)                                                     { a[0] = b[0]; a[1] = b[1]; a[2] = b[2]; a[3] = b[3]; }
00149 
00151         inline  void SetTranslation(Mat44& pResult, const Vec3f a)                                      { pResult[12] = a[0]; pResult[13] = a[1]; pResult[14] = a[2]; }
00152 
00154         inline  void Identity(Mat44& pResult)                                                                           { for (int i = 1; i < 15; ++i) pResult[i] = k0;         pResult[0] = pResult[5] = pResult[10] = pResult[15] = k1; }
00155 
00157                         void InputAngularVelocity(Quaternion& result, Real dt, const Vec3f a);
00158 
00160                         void Normalize(Quaternion& result, const Quaternion source);
00161 
00163         inline  void Multiply(Quaternion& result, const Quaternion a, const Quaternion b) {
00164                 Real ax = a[0]; Real ay = a[1]; Real az = a[2]; Real aw = a[3];
00165                 Real bx = b[0]; Real by = b[1]; Real bz = b[2]; Real bw = b[3];
00166                 Real tempx = aw * bx  +  ax * bw  +  ay * bz  -  az * by;
00167                 Real tempy = aw * by  +  ay * bw  +  az * bx  -  ax * bz;
00168                 Real tempz = aw * bz  +  az * bw  +  ax * by  -  ay * bx;
00169                 Real tempw = aw * bw  -  ax * bx  -  ay * by  -  az * bz;
00170                 result[0] = tempx; result[1] = tempy; result[2] = tempz; result[3] = tempw;     // done through temps to allow in-place multiply
00171         }
00172 
00173         // compound types
00174 
00180         class Plane
00181         {
00182         public:
00183                 Plane(const Plane& plane) {
00184                         m_D = plane.m_D;
00185                         Set(m_Normal, plane.m_Normal);
00186                 }
00187 
00188                 Plane(const Vec3f point, const Vec3f normal) {
00189                         Set(m_Normal, normal);
00190                         m_D = -Dot(normal, point);
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 Plane(const Vec3f p0, const Vec3f p1, const Vec3f p2) {
00194                         Vec3f t1;
00195                         Subtract(t1, p1, p0);
00196                         Vec3f t2;
00197                         Subtract(t2, p2, p0);
00198                         Cross(m_Normal, t1, t2);
00199                         Normalize(m_Normal, m_Normal);
00200                         m_D = - Dot(m_Normal, p0);
00201                 }
00202 
00203                 ~Plane() { }
00204 
00205                 Real DistanceToPoint(const Vec3f a) const {
00206                         return m_D + Dot(m_Normal, a);
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 Vec3f   m_Normal;               
00210                 Real    m_D;                    
00211         };
00212 }
